import React from 'react' import { useMutation } from '@tanstack/react-query' import { useFormik } from 'formik' import { postPostAPI } from '../../../services/postServices' const PostPage = ({user}) => { console.log('USER', user) const {mutateAsync,isPending,isError,error,isSuccess} = useMutation({ mutationFn: postPostAPI, mutationKey: ['post'] }) const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { title: '', content: '', dateTime: new Date(), image: '', author: user._id }, onSubmit: (values) => { mutateAsync(values) } }) return (
) } export default PostPage
